<row gap="medium">

---

This _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [arquebus](/Weapons.aspx?ID=195)_ is used by caravan guards to nonlethally—though powerfully—deter large game and bandits. When fired, the spark gun deals mental damage and adds the [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) trait to the attack. Each _mindlance_ also includes a [reinforced stock](/Weapons.aspx?ID=187) that benefits from any [fundamental runes](/equipment/runes/fundamental-weapon-runes) on the firearm. When you critically succeed at an attack roll with a _mindlance_, the target becomes [frightened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) unless it succeeds at a DC 24 Will save.

</column>
